section.title: customers searching for Search for Customer
section.para: To search for a Customer, select the "Search for Customer" option. The following screen will appear:
When searching to retrieve Customer information from the database, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter any character or combination of characters you want to match, followed by the TAB key.
The "Search for" field supports pattern matching with Regular Expressions. For more information on matching patterns using Regular Expressions, see .

tip.para: Hitting the TAB key activates the search operation.

listitem.para: Specify which of the following criteria you want to include in the search:
Customer Number: Select to search by Customer Number.
Customer Name: Select to search by Customer Name.
Primary Contact Name: Select to search by Primary Contact Name.
Primary Contact Phone #: Select to search by Primary Contact Phone Number.
Street Address: Select to search by Primary Contact Street Address.
City: Select to search by Primary Contact City.
State: Select to search by Primary Contact State.
Postal Code: Select to search by Primary Contact Postal Code.
Country: Select to search by Primary Contact Country.
Select to show inactive Customers as well as active Customers. By default, inactive Customers are not displayed.
Display will show search results for Customers, using specified parameters.
